main event: An observer reported seeing kidney-shaped objects in a formation resembling an 'M' in Mesa, Arizona.
interesting points: The observer had just laid down outside and saw the objects for about 2 to 3 seconds., The objects had a steady fluorescent glow and moved rapidly., The observer initially thought they were a flight of geese., The objects disappeared behind the roof line of houses., The analysis concluded that the sighting was likely birds rather than an unidentified flying object.
witness description: A 56-year-old unemployed male high school graduate, reliable observer.
